anisofix.config.title: AnisoFix Configuration
anisofix.config.panic_threshold.tooltip: Free VRAM amount (in MB) at which Panic Mode activates.
anisofix.config.recovery_threshold.toolt: Free VRAM amount (in MB) at which Panic Mode deactivates.
anisofix.config.enable_notifications.too: Show a chat message when entering/exiting Panic Mode.
anisofix.config.dynamic_mipmap_scaling.t: When in Panic Mode, also reduce mipmap levels to save VRAM.
anisofix.config.mipmap_panic_level.toolt: The mipmap level to use during Panic Mode (0 = disabled).
anisofix.config.show_hud.tooltip: Toggle the visibility of the Hardware HUD.
anisofix.config.show_gpu_name.tooltip: Display the name of your GPU in the HUD.
anisofix.config.show_gpu_vendor.tooltip: Display the vendor of your GPU in the HUD (e.g., NVIDIA, AMD).
anisofix.config.show_cpu_name.tooltip: Display the name of your CPU in the HUD.
anisofix.config.show_vram.tooltip: Display current VRAM usage and total VRAM in the HUD.
anisofix.config.show_af_level.tooltip: Displays the Anisotropic Filtering level in the HUD.
anisofix.config.show_mipmap_level.toolti: Displays the current Mipmap level in the HUD.
anisofix.config.anchor_point.tooltip: Sets the corner of the screen where the HUD will be displayed.
anisofix.config.x_offset.tooltip: Adjusts the horizontal position of the HUD from the anchor point.
anisofix.config.y_offset.tooltip: Adjusts the vertical position of the HUD from the anchor point.
